title: nandikEshvaram namAmyaham
sahitya:
nandikEshvaram namAmyaham nAgabhUSaNam naTEsha vAhanam


anupallavi

  sundara rUpam suhrddIpam indu shEkharam IshAna sEvakam


caraNam    shrI hrikEshASTOttara shata gIta dEshikam shivakaram tEjOvigraham
mOhavidAram mUlAdhAram shrI hari mitram shiva cinnagAtram
